scripts.test:docker: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx prisma db push && cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --runInBand && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v
scripts.docker:dev:restart: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.dev:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -u 0 api npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:generate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -u 0 api npx prisma generate
scripts.dev:studio: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api npx prisma studio --browser none
scripts.prod:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec api npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:generate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec api npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:studio: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec api npx prisma studio --browser none
scripts.docker:clean: docker image prune && docker network prune && docker volume prune && docker builder prune -a
scripts.docker:clean:safe: docker image prune -f && docker network prune -f && docker builder prune -f
scripts.docker:clean:all: docker image prune -a -f && docker network prune -f && docker volume prune -f && docker builder prune -a -f
